subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Carlos Sastre, who at one point during Wednesday’s stage was fetching water bottles for his teammate and race leader Frank Schleck, ended the day taking the yellow jersey off his shoulders.
snippet: Carlos Sastre, who at one point during Wednesday’s stage was fetching water bottles for his teammate and race leader Frank Schleck, ended the day taking the yellow jersey off his shoulders.
